question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate towards the roof of the red teaching building of a nearby school. Is the destination within sight at your current location? If yes, where is the destination in your view?  
choose:  
A. I see the roof of the red teaching building in the lower left corner of my field of view.  
B. I see the roof of the red teaching building in the center of my field of view.  
C. I see the roof of the red teaching building in the upper right corner of my field of view.  
D. I do not see the roof of the red teaching building within my field of view.  
E. I see the roof of the red teaching building on the right side of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The roof of the red teaching building is visible on the right side of the field of view as the agent approaches it. The building's red color and structure are clearly identifiable, and its roof becomes more prominent as the perspective shifts closer to it.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Here's my evaluation of the provided answer:

Option: E
Reason: From the initial frames of the video (0:00-0:05), the red teaching building is not visible. As the camera pans and the perspective shifts (0:35-0:45), the red teaching building comes into view on the right side of the screen. Therefore, the roof of the red teaching building is indeed visible on the right side of the field of view.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The roof of the red teaching building is visible on the right side of the field of view as the agent approaches it. The building's red color and structure are clearly identifiable, and its roof becomes more prominent as the perspective shifts closer to it.
